pageContext.claim: “The New York Times Sanctuary Cities/Immigration story today was knowingly wrong on almost every fact. They never call to check for truth. Their sources often don't even exist, a fraud. They will lie & cheat anyway possible to make me look bad.”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times and other mainstream organizations do not create fake sources; that is a firing offense. The New York Times did call for comment. Moreover, just 38 minutes after denouncing as a fake an article that said Trump was considering sending undocumented immigrants to sanctuary cities, Trump tweeted that sanctuary cities must accept undocumented immigrants.
